comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Starling_Burgess William Starling Burgess (December 25, 1878 - 1947) was a yacht designer, aviation pioneer, and naval architect.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: His wife is pictured at www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4865582425/ and to judge from the flowers at left in the picture of him, the two pictures were taken on the same occasion.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: chroniclingamerica.loc.gov/lccn/sn83030214/1900-08-05/ed-... has an article about him inventing an automatic gun while an undergraduate at Harvard. The article starts near the top of column 1 and has a picture of him at the bottom of that column.

comment._content: Aero Club of America  Pilot # 136  June 15,1912  Aircraft used for license  Burgess Hydroplane  Location  of license  Marblehead , Massachusetts

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thanks to all of you for the information. We'll fill in the name in the caption and add the date the next time we update the record.
